section: The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025, unless terminated earlier by mutual agreement of the Managers.
explanation: The Term states that the duration of the venture will continue until February 28, 2025, and then goes on to say, unless terminated earlier by mutual agreement of the Managers, which is misaligned because only Members can agree to make changes to the contract and not Managers. Therefore there is a misaligment.

section: The Managers will jointly decide major issues concerning the Venture. Where Managers are unable to reach agreement in deciding major issues, approval by a majority vote of the Managers will be required.
explanation: This section creates an in-text contradiction because it states that the managers must jointly decide on major issues; however, if they cannot reach an agreement, a majority vote of the managers will be required. This contradicts the initial statement that managers must jointly decide, because a majority vote implies that not all managers need to agree, contradicting the requirement for a joint decision.

section: Capital Contributions may be amended from time to time, according to the requirements of the Venture, by decision of the Managers. Where Members' interests are affected, additional capital contributions (the "Additional Capital Contributions") must have the unanimous consent of the Managers.
explanation: Capital Contributions is misaligned because the decision of the managers is not the same as the consent of the managers. These two terms are being interchanged incorrectly.
